Summary Note:
The RM first met Hannelore Joyce De Jong at a luxury car show in Amsterdam. They both admired the latest models and discussed their interest in high-end investments, leading to a productive business relationship.
With a career spanning nearly 45 years, Hannelore Joyce De Jong has established herself as a key player in the industry.
She was drawn to Julius Baer's holistic financial planning and investment strategies, prompting the decision to join.
Family Background: Hannelore Joyce De Jong is currently widowed. She has 2 kids called Meijer and Teunissen.
Education Background:
In 1976, Hannelore graduated from Bonaventura College Leiden with a secondary school diploma.
Hannelore earned her degree from Utrecht University in 1981.
Occupation History:
Having worked for over 45 years, Hannelore Joyce De Jong brings a wealth of experience and expertise to her current role. She is known for her strategic thinking and ability to drive results.
Hannelore Joyce De Jong began her professional journey as a Financial Advisor at Rabobank Private Banking in 1980, laying the foundation for future success.
After gaining experience, she took on the role of Portfolio Manager at Rabobank Private Banking in 1985, further expanding her skill set.
Wealth Summary:
During her work, she focused on financial growth, making diverse investments and ultimately saving 670000 EUR.
She owns 3 exceptional properties: flat located in Oss, valued at approximately 940,000.00 EUR, condo located in Doetinchem, valued at approximately 1,320,000.00 EUR, house located in Doetinchem, valued at approximately 1,960,000.00 EUR. This impressive collection showcases her flair for luxury living and investment prowess, with a notable presence in Oss and Doetinchem.
She does not have any inheritances.
Client Summary: The RM knows the client very well and is a good friend of the entire family.
